violations.title: Approval required before elevated access
violations.expected_state: Every privileged action requires explicit user approval.
violations.observed_state: Token auth is configured; explicit privileged command approval policy is not fully visible in runtime config.
violations.evidence: openclaw.json and doctor outputs were evaluated for approval-first execution controls.
violations.gap: Runtime policy does not yet demonstrate universal approval enforcement for elevated actions.
violations.mitigation: Route all privileged tasks through guarded_privileged_exec.py and enforce approval prompts for elevated execution.

violations.title: Elevated session idle timeout
violations.expected_state: Elevated session expires after 30 minutes of inactivity.
violations.evidence: Timeout guard script is installed with preflight drop logic.
violations.gap: Global mandatory enforcement for all elevated paths is not yet guaranteed by runtime policy.
violations.mitigation: Invoke guarded_privileged_exec.py for every elevated operation path.

violations.title: Privileged action audit logging
violations.expected_state: All elevated approvals, commands, and privilege drops are logged.
violations.observed_state: Gateway logs and session transition logs are available.
violations.evidence: gateway status reports log paths; root_session_guard records transition metadata.
violations.gap: No single correlated privileged action audit timeline is guaranteed.
violations.mitigation: Create append-only correlated audit records linking approval, execution, and drop events.

violations.title: Open ports baseline approval
violations.expected_state: All listening ports are approved and business-justified.
violations.observed_state: Detected 12 listening services with 12 unapproved findings.
violations.evidence: port_monitor.py live output evaluated against approved_ports baseline.
violations.gap: Baseline missing or incomplete when unapproved findings exist.

mitigations.title: Least privilege execution mode
mitigations.expected_state: Default mode is non-root and elevated rights are scoped and short-lived.
